title: Riot, Read this
body:
So i wanted to ask you rioters, how it is that your a multi billion dollar company (assumedly as you were making a billion 2 years ago) can't get an actual support team that actually reads what is said, let alone set out a proper freaking support page.

For the first, the biggest problem support has, is that it will always take you multiple replies to a ticket to get the ticket being answered by anything other then Ctrl+C/V, it shouldn't take several days for a ticket to be even close to actually being READ.

The second problem being the inability to actually get a ticket sent to the right place, because all of the actual ticket options are horrid, and there is no way to use them to actually get the person you need (which would be fine if you weren't only just being transferred a few days later)

I'm sorry but a key feature of someone who works at support, for the first reply is that you should READ the message, and then type a response, not read the headline and copy paste a response that is 9/10 times not actually going to help the problem.

replies.body:
Hi,

Although you have a point and many of us would **LOVE** a 24/7 Support chat or Email support.
Many Players email support daily/Hourly/Minutely.
And if you have ALOT of accounts on each server, then emails can get flooded.
Pressing Ctrl/V Is quicker then actually Hand Typing a message and Sorting out the issue.
You need too Look at it from a Big Point of view. Plus OCE isn't there most favorite server.
They have things like Korea and NA, And just because they make a lot of profit does not mean they will
Imply new things with that money.

Please Take this as a Answer rather than a argument.

-RedPandaFox

>Pressing Ctrl/V Is quicker then actually Hand Typing a message and Sorting out the issue.

Well they still need to read, the ctrl+V isn't the problem, the Ctrl+V while only reading a buzzword that suits it is the problem.

Like seriously a minute of reading and most Tickets could probably be done first shot instead of third.

I would absolutely love it if a riot employee gave a Cntrl+V reply to this post 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

The support page is made that way BY DESIGN! yes hard to believe but true.

They want you to give up sending in a ticket, unless its regarding payments or requesting something very simple.
Most companies these days just want automation to save on expenses. Quality is the sacrificial lamb. :\
